title: One Christmas Long Ago - In Concert (NYC Premiere)
desc: Please join us for the New York premiere of this rarely heard opera with its heartwarming story, stunning music and elegant performance by some of New York's finest and best loved singers. One Christmas Long Ago is dedicated to composer William Mayer, who turns 90 this year and who is being celebrated by Opera America for his outstanding musical contributions spanning 70 years. Mr. Mayer will be present at the performance.
